overview: Dr. Tawhid is a paediatrician in Dhaka, Bangladesh. In 2017, he visited the Rohingya refugee camp as a volunteer medic, where he met Osman, a 14-year-old boy. “I want to study. I want to become a doctor like you,” Osman reminded Tawhid himself as a kid. Tawhid promised Osman to fight for his future, and he becomes Osman’s only portal to a better life. At this point, Tawhid finally starts to worry about giving Osman a false dream because he cannot be the answer to Osman’s life…
title: The Border Within
